General Manager, Business Services Job at PricewaterhouseCoopers




        
    

        
        PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) Nigeria - Our client is a leading oilfield services company, delivering innovative and high-performance solutions across the energy value chain.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Manager, Business Services

Reference Number: 130-PEO01302
Job type: Permanent
Department: People & Change Nigeria

Job Summary
     

            
    




	As part of its strategic growth and operational excellence agenda, the organisation is seeking a seasoned professional to lead its business services function.
	The General Manager will provide strategic leadership and direction across business development, human capital, and operational support functions.
	This role is pivotal in driving organisational growth, enhancing service delivery, and ensuring alignment with the company’s long-term objectives.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead the development and execution of business development strategies to secure new contracts and expand existing client relationships.
	Oversee the implementation of service level standards and ensure operational efficiency across departments.
	Drive talent development, performance management, and organisational capability building.
	Ensure the availability of robust IT systems to support business operations.
	Provide strategic insights through market research and competitor analysis to inform business decisions.


Requirements


	Degree in Engineering, Business Administration, Human Resource Management or any related field.
	Minimum of 13 years of experience across one or two management areas with at least one being Human Resources and at least 5 years in a managerial role.
	Master’s in Business Administration, or MSc in Management.
	Relevant professional qualifications such as: COREN, Nigerian Institute of Management.

Human Resource (HR) Generalist Job at Dynambyte Solar Energy




        
    

        
        Dynambyte Solar Energy - Our client, a leading Manufacturing company, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource (HR) Generalist

Job Location: Agbara, Ogun

Job Description


	A leading manufacturing company is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented HR Generalist to support the day-to-day operations of the HR department.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Support recruitment activities, including job postings, screening, and interview coordination.
	Maintain employee records and ensure compliance with company policies and labor laws.
	Assist with payroll processing, benefits administration, and HR documentation.
	Coordinate onboarding, orientation, and training programs for new hires.
	Support employee engagement initiatives and promote a positive workplace culture.
	Provide guidance to employees on HR-related queries and escalate issues where necessary.
	Contribute to the development and implementation of HR policies and procedures.


Requirements


	Proven experience as an HR Generalist or in a similar HR support role.
	Good knowledge of HR processes, labor laws, and best practices.
	Strong organizational and multitasking skills with attention to detail.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work independently in a remote environment.
	Proficiency with HR software and MS Office tools.


Remuneration


	Salary: N250,000 - N300,000 monthly.
	Accommodation is available.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Oakshiring@gmail.com using "HR Generalist - Agbara" as the subject of the email.
